events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle colliding with a roadside barrier on June 9th at 5 PM.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords indicating a car collision and vehicle damage.
An agent was assigned to the claim to guide the customer through the accident claim process smoothly and promptly.
The claim acknowledgement was sent to the customer, confirming receipt and outlining next steps in the accident claim procedure.
Requested police report, vehicle damage photos, and driver’s license copy to process the auto accident claim efficiently.
Customer submitted all required documents including accident photos and police report, enabling smooth continuation of claim review.
Investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision started, including review of submitted documentation and accident details.
The investigation concluded confirming the liability on the other party, with all evidence supporting the customer’s claim.
A settlement amount was proposed covering the repair costs for the vehicle and any applicable medical expenses.
Customer provided positive feedback on the quick processing and clear communication regarding the auto accident claim settlement.
The claim was officially approved after agreement on the settlement amount with the customer, confirming claim coverage.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was issued to the customer’s designated account swiftly and securely.
The auto accident claim was closed following successful payment and final confirmation from the customer on receipt.
The closed claim was archived in the insurance system for future reference and record keeping purposes.
